overview:
Tal Florentin is the CEO and Co-Founder of Usersbox.

Before co-founding Usersbox, Tal graduatedÂ the distinguished programmers course at Mamram, the renowned IDF Computers Unit, where he continued as a Programmer, DBA, Team Leader, System Analyst and ProjectÂ Manager for almost a decade.
